Question
========

A college student wants to send a bouquet to her mother for Mother's Day. She can buy two of the following four types of roses: Blue Bell, Yellow Success, Sahara, and Aphrodite. We assume that all outcomes are equally likely. Then what is the probability that this student will choose Sahara and Aphrodite?

Answerlist
----------

* S
* J
* 1/6
* 1/8

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* S:Incorrect
* J: Incorrect
* 1/6: Correct
* 1/8: Incorrect
